name: Casali in Val di Chio

reviews.text: We loved our stay in Villa San Martino. Magnificent view, extremely peaceful. The pool area - where you spend most of your time if the weather permits - was perfect. The agency were extremely attentive to our requests, very helpful indeed. They arranged a charming babysitter who our daughters loved. The area is unbeatable, with plentiful beautiful villages on your doorstop. Highly recommend! Guy, London
reviews.title: Great family holiday

reviews.text: Stayed for 2 weeks in wonderful Villa San Martino owned by Casali in Val di Chio with our children , and then with friends . The villa is in a quite remote place , on top of a hill , with a breathtaking view on the mountains . Although the villa does not look large from the outside , the rooms are big and offer all possible amenities .The garden stays incredibly green under the Tuscan sun , and the pool is fresh and well kept . Every wish is immediately attended for by the owners with a smile . Thank you , Roberta , for one of the nicest holidays in our lives . This place in Paradise on Earth . We'll be back .
reviews.title: Paradise on Earth
Very good house, quite, wounderful valley
reviews.text: We stayed in Villa San Martino which is just a perfect spot. Has been renovated last year and is in very good condition (Pool, Kitchen, TV, SAT, WIFI etc.). Try the wine and go to agritourismo Santo Stefano. Ask for Antonio. Very friendly person and excellent food.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have been in La Guardata many times since 1999, and we often combine it with holidays in other parts of Italy. Meanwhile it feels as if it is our own. The house is situated at a beautiful and large quiet spot between olive trees, hills and a large pine nut tree, overlooking Val di Chiana, Val di Chio and Castiglion Fiorentino, either from inside, outside, or the swimming pool in the garden. The rooms are spacious and comfortable and the 2 bedrooms each have their own bath room which is very nice when you have guests. The kitchen is well equipped and on colder days it is nice to use the open fire place in the kitchen.
reviews.title: Our home away from home

reviews.text: It is a perfect spot for walking in the nearby area, or visits to the Tuscan or Umbrian region with its beautiful nature and small villages. The centre of Castiglion Fiorentino is only half an hour by foot.
reviews.title: Il Granaio is a perfect little paradise on earth
Wine tasting and wines!
reviews.text: I had the opportunity to visit Casal in Val di Chio. Had excellent wine tasting session with an excellen touch of wine making history. Wide and quality wine collection for little winery. Excellent place to visit!!! Povent IGT Toscana 2008 is a must purchase.

We were eight people spending a week in villa La Guardata, one of the Casali properties. The ancient perfectly refurbished farm house is very clean, very well equipped and offers an amazing panoramic view on Castiglione and the Val di Chio. We were very satisfied and can easily recommend a stay in La Guardata. While being there, try also the bisteccas at Ristorante Muzzicone in Castiglion.
reviews.title: A very good place to discover southern Tuscany

reviews.text: La Guardata is also a good starting to discover the great towns of Arezzo, Cortona, Montepluciano and Perugia, all of them within a 45-minutes drive. But, Lidia and Roberta, could you please, please, do some repair work on the access road, which is really a bit ...bumpy?
reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect
A Tuscan Dream
reviews.text: We had the pleasure of staying in Villa San Martino for one week this spring. My husband and I travelled with our three children ages 2, 7 and 10, my Father in Law and our good friend. The house was perfect for us. My Father in Law enjoyed the privacy of the separate sleeping cottage and the home was perfect for the rest of us with a private bath in each bedroom, comfortable beds and beautiful grounds. The swimming area was wonderful for the kids and the yard had plenty of space to relax and enough room to play soccer with the kids. The private location of the home is breathtaking with amazing views of the Tuscan country side. We enjoyed spending time exploring the surrounding towns and loved to come "home" at the end of the day to enjoy a glass of wine outside. Roberta and Lidia were very helpful in answering any questions that we had. We enjoyed our tour of the vineyards and the wine tasting. They also arrange a private cooking class at Villa San Martino for my 8 year old daughter and I which we will remember fondly forever. (I am trying to recreate the Ragu sauce that we learned to make as I type this review.) Our experience staying here was perfect and I look forward to returning someday. Cheers Lidia and Roberta and I hope that you find the golden sheep someday!

Today is the second last day of a week that my family and I have spent at villa San Martino (one of the properties within casali in Val Di Chio) and I felt compelled to post a review. It has been without doubt the best place we have ever stayed in. It is actually hard to condense all the things we have loved about the villa into this review.
reviews.title: A first class holiday

reviews.text: We had two week holiday in house called La Capanna with 3 and 1 year old children. House is located on peaceful hill and has beautiful garden where kids can play safely. House has own kitchen, two bathrooms, two bedrooms and living room. There are also washing machine, dishwasher, Internet, TV, heating and fireplace. You can access shared swimming pool area which has amazing scenery over Val Di Chio and Castiglion Fiorentino. Swimming pool area is shared with 3 other houses that you can also rent. Outside the fenced garden area there are good hiking trails (for e.g. trail to Petreto).
reviews.title: Perfect holiday for families traveling with children

reviews.text: We spent relaxing two weeks in Castiglion Fiorentino eating good food, swimming and relaxing. We visited also Arezzo (18km), Firenze (100km) and Cortona (18km). Val Di Chiana Outlet has great shopping possibilties and there's also playing ground and Carousels for kids.
reviews.title: Wine tasting at Casali in Val di Chio

reviews.text: People in Castiglion Fiorentino and Tuscany are easy going and very friendly. It does not matter if you don't speak fluent italian, they are always willing to try frienly conversation. We can warmly recommend Casali in Val di Chio and Castiglion Fiorentino. Our Holiday went great.
reviews.title: Simply Perfect!

reviews.text: While we didn't stay here, we visited to do a wine and olive oil tasting with our family. Two sisters took over the operation from their grandfather in 1997 and have worked hard to give their wines a distinctly feminine touch in what tends to be a very male-dominated industry. The wines and explanations were outstanding and the olive oil was a special treat. Just a year or so from achieving organic certification, the owners are working successfully to create a niche. Definitely a highlight of our Tuscan vacation.
reviews.title: Beautiful Place... Beautiful People!

reviews.text: The hospitality and generosity of this gorgeous Tuscan escape and its hosts speaks through the delicious wine, amazing food, and wonderful company. I was fortunate enough to spend three months in Castiglion Fiorentino and spent much of my time at Casali in Val di Chio. The villas are amazingly clean and the breathtaking views make this place a true paradise. I absolutely cannot wait to come back here and bring my family and friends!
reviews.title: The Finest Way to Experience Tuscany

reviews.text: This is a lovely family run business where they have self-catering accommodation and also a winery. We did a tasting one evening at the winery - visited the cellar, got the history of the property and the wines and enjoyed the tasting with the knowledgeable winemaker. It was nice and casual but so enjoyable to hear about the local wines and the research and hard work that has gone into this great place. Well done lady winemakers!
reviews.title: Great small winery visit

reviews.text: From the warm welcome upon arrival in this beautiful Tuscan village, we knew we were in for a treat. The villa was clean & well appointed with everything we needed. The views from the villa and the pool were stunning. We are sad to leave & would highly recommend this to other travellers.
reviews.title: Paradise in Tuscany!

reviews.text: We look forward to returning.
reviews.title: The charm of Tuscany is here!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I had the pleasure of discovering the beauty of Tuscany in our 10 day visit here. Tired of cramped hotels, this very clean, very charming apartment allowed us to relax and unwind from our previous travels. I enjoyed cooking healthy meals with produce from the local market in the well-equipped kitchen. The king-sized bed was very comfortable, especially after our hectic sightseeing days. Centrally located, we visited Siena, Cortona, and Florence with our rental car. When we weren't traveling, we stayed out by the amazingly beautiful pool area, read, or wandered around the picturesque town of Castiglion Fiorentino. Excellent Wifi, too, for keeping in touch. Lidia and Roberta and their staff were incredibly helpful, and always with a smile on their faces. My husband and I look forward to returning with friends or family to share this wonderful experience! Oh... if you ever get the chance to see a medieval flag performance, don't miss it! Beautiful!
reviews.title: Awesome holidays

reviews.text: Very nice accommodation, beautiful original tuscan villa (San Martino) situated above the val di chio. The gravel road to the villa is a bit bumpy, but the location and its views are totally worth it. Enjoyable silence in the mountains. Kitchen and bathrooms are very well equipped, beds could be a bit more comfortable. Pool and garden are very nicely cared for. Herbs can be taken from the garden, where also a nice bbq grill is located. Internet access is very good. Hiking and cycling paradise. Wines and olive oil from the Buccelettis are excellent, do the wine tasting!
reviews.title: Villa Guardata

aka: Casali In Val Di Chio Castiglion Fiorentino, Italy - Tuscany
description: “Casali in Val di Chio”, is situated in the Valley of Chio, in the heart of Tuscany near the Medival town of Castiglion Fiorentino. Our Agricultural Firm is composed of four “Casali”, Villa La Guardata, Borgo S. Stefano, Borgo Gaggioleto and Villa S. Martino. Our Reception serve as a place to great our guest but it also houses our wine cellar, and packaging laboratory for our products; wine and olive oil.
